from sys import maxsize

def maxSubArraySum(a, size):
    max_so_far = -maxsize + 1
    max_ending_here = 0
    start = 0
    end = 0
    s = 0
    for i in range(0, size):
        max_ending_here += a[i]
        if max_so_far < max_ending_here:
            max_so_far = max_ending_here
            start = s
            end = i
        if max_ending_here < 0:
            max_ending_here = 0
            s = i + 1
    return (max_so_far, start, end)

def max_sum_of_two_non_empty_subarrays(coins):
    n = len(coins)
    if n < 2:
        raise ValueError('The array must contain at least two coins.')
    t_lst = coins[:]
    aaa = abs(-n // 2)
    (maxi, start, end) = maxSubArraySum(coins[0:aaa], aaa)
    l = coins[aaa:]
    (M, st, en) = maxSubArraySum(l, len(l))
    x = maxi + M
    (maxi, start, end) = maxSubArraySum(t_lst, n)
    t_lst = t_lst[0:start] + t_lst[end + 1:]
    (M, st, en) = maxSubArraySum(t_lst, len(t_lst))
    y = maxi + M
    return max(x, y)
